Room.Name: West Forest Lane
Room.ShortDescription: This is a wide lane through the Enchanted Forest.
Room.LongDescription: Heavy brush is on either side, and has apparently been cut back recently. You can see fresh wagon marks and steaming piles of horse manure in the middle of the lane, all evidence that this is a well traveled path in the woods. A cross lane is over to the west. The path disappears around a bend going in the southeast direction.
